nws.name: Overnight
nws.detailedForecast: Patchy fog and a slight chance of rain before 5am. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 32. West wind 7 to 12 mph, with gusts as high as 23 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

nws.name: Wednesday
nws.detailedForecast: A chance of snow between 11am and 4pm. Partly sunny. High near 40, with temperatures falling to around 33 in the afternoon. Northwest wind 13 to 24 mph, with gusts as high as 39 mph. Chance of precipitation is 30%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

nws.name: Wednesday Night
nws.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 26. Northwest wind 6 to 12 mph.

nws.name: Christmas Day
nws.shortForecast: Slight Chance Snow Showers then Mostly Cloudy
nws.detailedForecast: A slight chance of snow showers between 10am and 11am. Mostly cloudy, with a high near 39. West wind 9 to 16 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

nws.name: Thursday Night
nws.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 14. Northwest wind 12 to 18 mph, with gusts as high as 30 mph.

nws.name: Friday
nws.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny, with a high near 24. North wind 6 to 12 mph.

nws.name: Friday Night
nws.detailedForecast: A chance of snow after 7pm. Cloudy, with a low around 18. North wind around 7 mph. Chance of precipitation is 50%. New snow accumulation of less than one inch possible.

nws.name: Saturday
nws.detailedForecast: A chance of snow. Mostly cloudy, with a high near 29. North wind around 9 mph. Chance of precipitation is 50%. New snow accumulation of around one inch possible.

nws.name: Saturday Night
nws.detailedForecast: A slight chance of snow before 2am. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 21. North wind around 7 mph.

nws.name: Sunday
nws.shortForecast: Slight Chance Light Snow then Chance Rain And Snow
nws.detailedForecast: A slight chance of snow between 11am and noon, then a chance of rain and snow. Mostly cloudy, with a high near 38. Southwest wind around 7 mph. Chance of precipitation is 50%.

nws.name: Sunday Night
nws.detailedForecast: Rain. Cloudy, with a low around 28. Southwest wind 7 to 10 mph. Chance of precipitation is 80%.

nws.name: Monday
nws.detailedForecast: Rain likely. Partly sunny, with a high near 38. West wind 10 to 15 mph, with gusts as high as 26 mph. Chance of precipitation is 70%.

nws.name: Monday Night
nws.shortForecast: Slight Chance Light Snow then Partly Cloudy
nws.detailedForecast: A slight chance of snow before 10pm. Partly cloudy, with a low around 20. West wind around 15 mph, with gusts as high as 25 mph.

nws.name: Tuesday
nws.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny, with a high near 30. West wind 12 to 15 mph, with gusts as high as 25 mph.
